name: Virality
description: A great retro-2D platform adventure trying to stop a global alien computer virus infection.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i7-3632QM 2.2GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730M or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 37 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
